About Us

We are a small and privately owned mixed martial arts gym. We were established in 2007 and have instructed clients for physical fitness, self defense, and competative combat sports. We are located at 9525 South, Hickory Hills, IL, 60467 on the far end of the shopping center. For additional information please feel free to contact us at 708-430-4206.

We teach...

  • Boxing
  • Kickboxing
  • Muay Thai
  • Jiu Jitsu (gi and Nogi)
  • Wrestling
  • Judo
  • Wing Chun
